projects.title: ESP-based Smart Plug (WiFi Controlled)
projects.description: Designed and developed multiple hardware variants of a WiFi-controlled smart plug using ESP microcontrollers. The device accepts 220V AC input and provides switched 220V outputs rated up to 16A per channel. Controlled via a mobile application (WiFi) with support for OTA firmware updates and optional energy monitoring. Contributed to hardware design and PCB layouts; 1/2/3-channel variants.
features: Up to 16 A per channel switching capability
Mobile app control (WiFi) and MQTT/HTTP APIs

projects.title: Ground Station for Electric Vehicle
projects.description: Remote monitoring and telemetry ground station for electric vehicles. Collects real-time data from on-vehicle control boards via serial links and displays telemetry on a user-friendly GUI.
features: Real-time telemetry from vehicle control boards
Transmits speed, temperature, voltage, remaining energy
